akn:section.akn:heading: Preference to Indians in employment of clerical, mechanical, and other help

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 46. Preference to Indians in employment of clerical, mechanical, and other help Preference shall at all times, as far as practicable, be given to Indians in the employment of clerical, mechanical, and other help on reservations and about agencies. (May 17, 1882, ch. 163, § 6, 22 Stat. 88; July 4, 1884, ch. 180, § 6, 23 Stat. 97.)
